docs.abstract: The company’s liquidation last year left many people in the toy industry bitter. Now, an attempted comeback is being met with skepticism.
docs.snippet: The company’s liquidation last year left many people in the toy industry bitter. Now, an attempted comeback is being met with skepticism.
docs.lead_paragraph: In Fort Collins, Colo., a vacant Toys “R” Us store is being turned into an adventure park, with trampolines and dodge ball courts. Scandinavian furniture has replaced Fisher-Price baby gear at a location in Sioux Falls, S.D. In northwest Atlanta, a Hobby Lobby is moving in.

headline.main: Toys ‘R’ Us Tries to Rise From the Ashes. Wary Partners Try Not to Get Burned.
headline.print_headline: Toys ‘R’ Us Wants Cynics To Be Game for a Rebirth

docs.abstract: Sanrio granted the studio film rights to Hello Kitty after a five-year courtship. The character has never been given the Hollywood treatment before.
docs.snippet: Sanrio granted the studio film rights to Hello Kitty after a five-year courtship. The character has never been given the Hollywood treatment before.
docs.lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — For the first time, Hello Kitty is coming to Hollywood.

headline.main: Hello, Kitty! Warner Bros. Welcomes a Beloved Character
headline.print_headline: Warner Bros. Lands a Big Fish: Hello Kitty Goes Hollywood

docs.abstract: Lost faith in Facebook after data leakages, breaches and too much noise? Here’s a guide to breaking up with the social network and its photo-sharing app for good.
docs.snippet: Lost faith in Facebook after data leakages, breaches and too much noise? Here’s a guide to breaking up with the social network and its photo-sharing app for good.
docs.lead_paragraph: You may have decided enough is enough: It’s time to delete Facebook.

docs.abstract: Here’s a comprehensive comparison of the two services to help you choose your go-to app for hitching rides.
docs.snippet: Here’s a comprehensive comparison of the two services to help you choose your go-to app for hitching rides.
docs.lead_paragraph: Uber and Lyft recently made clear that they are in the ride-hailing business for the long haul. Shortly after Lyft went public with plenty of fanfare last month, Uber shared its plans for its own initial public offering.

headline.main: Uber vs. Lyft: Which Ride-Hailing App Is Better?
headline.print_headline: Uber or Lyft? The Envelope, Please

docs.abstract: African-American workers have reported threats, humiliation and barriers to promotion at the plant. The automaker says there is no pattern of bias.
docs.snippet: African-American workers have reported threats, humiliation and barriers to promotion at the plant. The automaker says there is no pattern of bias.
docs.lead_paragraph: FREMONT, Calif. — Owen Diaz had seen swastikas in the bathrooms at Tesla’s electric-car plant, and he had tried to ignore racist taunts around the factory.

headline.main: Menial Tasks, Slurs and Swastikas: Many Black Workers at Tesla Say They Faced Racism

docs.abstract: The professor, a star in his field, resigned from the American Economic Association’s executive committee in the face of pressure from other members.
docs.snippet: The professor, a star in his field, resigned from the American Economic Association’s executive committee in the face of pressure from other members.
docs.lead_paragraph: Roland G. Fryer Jr., a prominent economist who is under investigation at Harvard University over allegations of sexual harassment, resigned on Tuesday as a leader of the most prestigious organization in academic economics.

headline.main: Roland Fryer, Accused of Harassment at Harvard, Quits Economics Panel
headline.print_headline: Economist Quits Panel Amid Claims Of Misconduct

byline.original: By Jim Tankersley and Ben Casselman

docs.abstract: The United States has the opportunity to incubate technologies that could enable a digital transnational currency of the future.
docs.snippet: The United States has the opportunity to incubate technologies that could enable a digital transnational currency of the future.
docs.lead_paragraph: After spending decades as the dominant global reserve currency, the dollar’s position is being challenged.

headline.main: America Could Lead the Transition to a Digital Currency Reserve

docs.abstract: The two wireless operators are moving closer to a merger following approval from a federal government security committee and other top officials.
docs.snippet: The two wireless operators are moving closer to a merger following approval from a federal government security committee and other top officials.
docs.lead_paragraph: A federal government committee and other top regulators in the United States have approved the proposed merger between T-Mobile and Sprint, paving the way for a union between the country’s third- and fourth-largest wireless operators.

headline.main: Sprint, T-Mobile Deal Gets Green Light From U.S. Regulators
headline.print_headline: Sprint and T-Mobile Are Step Closer to Merger

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Committee on Foreign Investment in the United States (CFIUS)

docs.abstract: By Tuesday, 11 companies had pulled their ads in response to the host’s on-air comment that immigration “makes our own country poorer and dirtier.”
docs.snippet: By Tuesday, 11 companies had pulled their ads in response to the host’s on-air comment that immigration “makes our own country poorer and dirtier.”
docs.lead_paragraph: The Fox News host Tucker Carlson has lost advertisers after saying on the air last week that allowing certain immigrants into the United States “makes our own country poorer and dirtier and more divided.”

headline.main: Advertisers Flee Tucker Carlson’s Fox News Show After He Derides Immigrants
headline.print_headline: Advertisers Flee Fox Show After Host Mocks Immigrants

docs.abstract: Real action to protect privacy hinges on big institutions, to the point that small, individual measures pale in comparison. But there are still ways to act.
docs.snippet: Real action to protect privacy hinges on big institutions, to the point that small, individual measures pale in comparison. But there are still ways to act.
docs.lead_paragraph: Every time we see a fresh example of how badly our privacy has been eroded by the same tech companies that tout a commitment to protect it, the same reactions pop up. Boycott the service, stop using their products, delete them forever and don’t look back. They’re all valid responses.

headline.main: What We Can Learn About Online Privacy From Climate Change
headline.print_headline: Taking Small Steps to Preserve Privacy
